attributes.review:
I, as a 74 year old Donald Trump Supporter, decided it would be an excellent app to download to support my amazing president. Now, I am not like those kids who are always on their cellphones and I am not too good with technology. But my lack of tech knowledge was NOT the downfall of this app. I opened the app and it then said ğ—”ğ—¥ğ—¥ğ—˜ğ—¦ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—˜ ğ—–ğ—¢ğ—£ğ—¦ ğ—ªğ—›ğ—¢ ğ—ğ—œğ—Ÿğ—Ÿğ—˜ğ—— ğ—•ğ—¥ğ—˜ğ—¢ğ—¡ğ—¡ğ—” ğ—§ğ—”ğ—¬ğ—Ÿğ—¢ğ—¥ !! I, as an idiotic racist Bunker Boy lover, did not like this and I did not even know what it meant!! Iâ€™m assuming itâ€™s something important,
though. Then! I got an ad that said ğ—”ğ—–ğ—”ğ—•!! Now, again Im not sure what this quote means but Iâ€™m assuming itâ€™s something important because I love my president Donald, and I donâ€™t think heâ€™d say anything bad. After that, I went into one of the pages (I donâ€™t know the correct word; again, technology is not my hobby) and it said ğ—¡ğ—¢ ğ—ğ—¨ğ—¦ğ—§ğ—¨ğ—–ğ—˜, ğ—¡ğ—¢ ğ—£ğ—˜ğ—”ğ—–ğ—˜!! What is this buffoonery?? I exited the app AT ONCE and then i got a screen on my iPhone that said ğ——ğ—˜ğ—™ğ—¨ğ—¡ğ—— ğ—§ğ—›ğ—˜ ğ—£ğ—¢ğ—Ÿğ—œğ—–ğ—˜. I was incredibly confused as you can imagine and it was very disorienting, especially for an older folk like me. When I saw these disgusting reviews I thought it was one of those silly jokes made by the children of Generation Z, but after looking at this app, I, a 74 year old, can confirm it is NOT! I knew those kids were up to no good when they messed up our rally (which I unfortunately could
not attend because i had to water my eggs), but this is NOT A PRANK BY THEM. 0/10 app. PLEASE take it off the Apple Store. Disgusting.
